remarks: Triangular inequality, combined with cancellation law for subtraction (applied three times).  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
absnpncan3d.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
absnpncan3d.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
absnpncan3d.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
absnpncan3d.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. CC ) $.
absnpncan3d.e $e |- ( ph -> E e. CC ) $.
absnpncan3d $p |- ( ph -> ( abs ` ( A - E ) ) <_ ( ( ( ( abs ` ( A - B ) ) + ( abs ` ( B - C ) ) ) + ( abs ` ( C - D ) ) ) + ( abs ` ( D - E ) ) ) ) $.
